function EP02_28()
    --.結-3【6月第4週】「姫選挙-戦姫ｖｓ姫ギャル-」
    SaveData.Title = "姫選挙-戦姫ｖｓ姫ギャル-"

    --//BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//SE：戦姫コール
    PLAY_SE("SEf026.wav", 1000, true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0061.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Announcement】
 "Erika Ikusa-chan!!! Please come to the stage!!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0382.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes!" ]])

    MSG([[ Called by name, I stepped out from backstage onto the stage. ]])

    --//BG：白む視界
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",2000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0383.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 (Ah, wait—what was I doing again—) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ At that moment, my mind went completely blank. ]])
    --//BG：選挙ステージ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024ca")
    LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,200,200)
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,0,200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,0,-200,10000,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",2000,false)

    MSG([[ The crowd was roaring with excitement. The shout of "Battle Princess" echoed. A spotlight shone solely on me. ]])

    --//CG：ステージ上のエリカ（困惑）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"EVa001aa")
    LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,200,200)
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,880,300)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,880,-460,10000,Ease.OutQuad)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ And I was wearing a cute uniform like a female student’s. ]])

    MSG([[ I couldn’t grasp the situation. My legs trembled with tension, and I felt like I might collapse right then and there. What on earth was happening to me? ]])

STOP_SE("SEf026.wav", 1000)
PLAY_BGM("BGM12.wav",1000,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0062.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Announcement】
 "Ladies & Gentle Girls<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Now, now, now! It’s time for the Princess Election everyone’s been waiting for!" ]])
    --//注釈：￥はハート

    MSG([[ A voice began to flow from the speakers above the stage. A voice resonating like the sound of bells echoed throughout the venue. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0063.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Announcement】
 "Charismatic fashionista adored by high school girls, the princess gal, Lira-chan, and the rising star who gained popularity at the entrance ceremony, the Battle Princess Erika-chan!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0064.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Announcement】
 "Both are incredibly, incredibly cute! But only one can become one of the Four Princesses... Everyone?<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Are you ready to vote? Hehehe<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    --//注釈：￥はハート

    --//SE：歓声（MAX)
    PLAY_SE("SEf001.wav",0,true)

    MSG([[ Applause erupted. The venue trembled with energy. The audience was so passionate it felt like it could ignite. ]])

    MSG([[ Though a tingling sensation lingered in my brain, I remembered the truth that I was here at the school’s princess election. ]])

    STOP_SE("SEf001.wav",1000)

    MSG([[ That’s right. I’m not Minato Ikusa now. I’m playing Erika Ikusa, the school’s admired beautiful girl. ]])

    --//CG：ステージ上のエリカ（決意）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVa001ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0384.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I… no, I will definitely become the school’s princess. To save my precious sister…!" ]])

    MSG([[ I touched the brooch at my chest and took a deep breath to calm my heart pounding as if about to burst. ]])

    MSG([[ The trembling in my legs finally stopped. ]])

    MSG([[ Then, I stepped forward to the center of the stage where my competitor waited. ]])

    --//BG：ステージ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024ca")
    --//BU：リラ（ウインク）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ My rival, standing at the center already—a flashy gal-style girl—smiled defiantly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0189.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wink
 "I’ll give you credit for standing on stage without running away. But get ready, weed<sprite="Emoji" name="note">, I’ll stomp you out with everything I’ve got!" ]])

    MSG([[ Though her piercing hostility almost made me step back, I somehow held my ground. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ It’s okay. I have grown in these three months. I won’t tremble like before. I am fearless. ]])

    MSG([[ I can do my best. For my sister… I can do anything. ]])

    MSG([[ I will show that I can be cuter than the beautiful girls called the school’s "Princesses." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0385.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "Wait for me… Sister." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ As I kept walking forward one step at a time, memories flashed through my mind— ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(80,"BG000ab")
    LAYER_ALPHA(80,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(80,255,100,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(100)
    LAYER_LOAD(80,"")
    --//effect：セピア調（回想）
    --//CG：姫神ダリア登場
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV004aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//CG：龍宮院ウラン登場（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVa005aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//CG：姫神エルメス登場
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV006aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//CG：鬼灯リラ登場
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//CG：着替えるクラスメイトに囲まれるエリカ。
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV010aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//CG：リラの怒り泣き
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ It has truly been an overwhelming three months. But this is finally a turning point. ]])

    MSG([[ Depending on the results of the upcoming election, it will be decided if I can earn the title of the school’s princess. ]])

    --//BG：選挙ステージ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024ca")
    --//BU：エルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0065.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Smiling
 "Well then, let me explain the rules of the Princess Election once again<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    --//注釈：￥はハート

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0066.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Smiling
 "From now, Erika-chan and Lira-chan will take turns making appeals themed on ‘fashion’!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0067.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Smiling
 "Everyone watching should vote on your tablets for the person you want to support<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    --//注釈：￥はハート

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0068.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Wink
 "You can easily tap to vote and even change your vote anytime! If you think they’re cute, just keep voting!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0069.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Wry smile
 "Hehehe<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> I’m super into changing my votes when I’m having fun too~<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Tapping is just so much fun! Tap tap~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0070.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Smiling
 "After five rounds of appeals, whoever receives more votes wins<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> The voting ratios will be displayed in real time on the stage screen, so it’ll be thrilling<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    --//CI：得票率 リラ50：エリカ50 040
LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI040a")
LAYER_POSITION(60,0,200)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

--WAIT(1000)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,200,500,Ease.InSine)
WAIT(500)
LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0071.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】Wink
 "Anything can happen until the end, so both of you give your best cutest display<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Now then… let the appeal time begin!" ]])
    --//注釈：￥はハート

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Hermes-san made a heart shape with her hands, then spun in steps as she left toward the side of the stage. ]])

    MSG([[ The venue was suddenly filled with high-pitched cheers. The crowd’s expectations for me and Lira-san left on stage threatened to burst the atmosphere with its heat. ]])

    MSG([[ The Princess Election fire has finally been lit. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0386.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 (How should I move first?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I have never seen a Princess Election, so I have no idea what the correct procedure is to start. Is it okay to start moving now? ]])

    --//BU：リラ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0190.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Smiling
 "Are you frozen with nervousness? Then I’ll start my appeal first." ]])

    MSG([[ —Damn. While I was spacing out, Lira-san winked at me once and stepped forward to the front of the stage. ]])

    MSG([[ She put her hands on her hips and struck a perfect pose. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0191.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Provocative
 "This stage is my domain. You amateur, just watch quietly!" ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san’s dazzling outfit fluttered as she took professional-model-level elegant steps. ]])

    MSG([[ Even as a competitor, I couldn’t help but be captivated by her beauty. ]])
    --//SE：歓声（中）
PLAY_SE("SEf002.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ The crowd erupted even more. ]])

    --//CI：得票率 リラ70：エリカ30 041
LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI041a")
LAYER_POSITION(60,0,200)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Voting percentages shifted. The tide turned quickly in Lira-san’s favor. ]])

    MSG([[ Surely my spacing out worked against me. ]])

    MSG([[ Appeals on stage change the very atmosphere of the venue. If I do nothing, my defeat is inevitable. ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Summon your courage and step forward. First, calmly review what you practiced! ]])

    STOP_SE("SEf002.wav",1000)

    -- wiz マスターの際は画像等を作成し対応予定
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0072.wav")
    MSG([[
    【System Message】
 "During the Princess Election, the knowledge Erika has learned flashes back one after another." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0073.wav")
    MSG([[
    【System Message】
 "As the cheers grow louder and visibility decreases, choose calmly and without haste from the best options you have learned." ]])

PLAY_SE("SEf002.wav",500,true)
    --//選択：【平常心】
    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP02_1,"女装の稽古で初めに学んだことは何か")

STOP_SE("SEf002.wav")

    if result == false then
        OgaEnd("EP_OGA_01_02" , "EP_BAD_03" , "EP02_28")
        return
    end

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0387.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Panicked
 (Right. Remember the cross-dressing training. In times like this, first relax. Stay calm and keep your composure.) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0388.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】(Serious)
 (First, as always, I’ll draw courage from Marika-nee’s pendant.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I touched the brooch at my chest and exhaled deeply twice. The muscles stiffened by tension relaxed just a little. ]])

    MSG([[ Alright, it’s okay. I can walk properly. I can fight Lira-san. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0389.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "I will definitely become the ‘Princess’…!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I stepped directly in front of the stage and made a deep bow. Unlike Lira-san, I tried to be as composed and graceful as possible. ]])

    MSG([[ I felt the scorching heat of the venue cool down a bit. ]])

    MSG([[ Not because the energy had dropped, but because the audience was watching me carefully. ]])
    --//CI：得票率 リラ60：エリカ40 042
LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI042a")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Good. I managed to bring the vote ratio closer to the original. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ I must avoid competing directly against Lira-san’s flashy fashion sense. ]])

    MSG([[ Because if we compete head-on, I will be shown up on the difference in style, and it will be over. ]])

    MSG([[ If I have a chance of winning, it’s only by appealing in a different direction from Lira-san. ]])

    MSG([[ First, I’ll appeal the refined side that Hiyu-san often praises. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0390.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "I’ll maintain the voting gap until the final appeal." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024ce")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,0,200)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0192.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "What are you smirking about, you weeds!!!" ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san shouted loudly as if reading my thoughts. The crowd’s attention immediately shifted to her. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0193.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Smiling
 "You all just watch me quietly. I’ll show you as the princess, the one-and-only cuteness that shoots hearts worldwide<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0194.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Provoking
 "So—everyone, cheer for me! This isn’t a request, it’s an order! Got it?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "…………" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG024ca")
    LAYER_SCALE(200,200,200)
    LAYER_EFFECT(200, 7)
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_RIR01ba")
    LAYER_SCALE(201,150,150)
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,185)
    SET_CUTIN_07_XL(-35, 60, 35, 500, true)
    RIR_PARTICLE_02(202, "BUL_RIR01ba", 185, 300)
    RIR_PARTICLE_01(250, 0, 0, 100, 150)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0195.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "Answer me, weeds!!!" ]])

    RESET_CUTIN_07_02(60, 200)
    RESET_RIR_PARTICLE(201, 250)

PLAY_VOICE("yuhi_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "Y-Yes!!!" ]])

    -- CI：得票率 リラ90：エリカ10 043
LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI043a")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ The atmosphere that was shifting because of my appeal was instantly covered by Lira-san’s mood. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024ca")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0074.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Whoa!? What a move, Lira-chan! With a single command, she expanded her lead all at once!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0075.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "That was Lira-chan’s special skill, ‘<r=リライティング>I’m-Your-Superior-Order</r>’! When hit by Lira’s charisma, people just can’t help but follow her orders~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ No matter how many times, no matter how often I hear the explanation, it still feels unbelievable. ]])

    MSG([[ The idea that as long as Lira-san’s aura sharpens, she can reverse the tide with just one order. ]])

    MSG([[ Is there really any way to win against such a superhuman? ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0391.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "...Calm down. It’s as expected." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Up to this point was predictable. To beat her, I only have that secret strategy. Remember what nickname I’m known by. ]])

PLAY_SE("SEf002.wav",500,true)
    --//選択：【戦姫】
    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP02_2,"ボクは何という名前で呼ばれているか。")

STOP_SE("SEf002.wav")

    if result == false then
        OgaEnd("EP_OGA_01_02" , "EP_BAD_03" , "EP02_28")
        return
    end

    --//SE：ジャンプ音
PLAY_SE("SEa007.wav")
WAIT(200)
    --//SE：身を翻す音
PLAY_SE("SEc022.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ I kicked off the floor with force and jumped backward. I leapt over Lira-san beside me, spinning once in midair. ]])

    --//CI：驚く観客 044
LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI044a")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ I winked at the audience below and landed straight down. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    --//SE：着地音
PLAY_SE("SEc032.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ Moreover, I jumped again immediately upon landing— ]])
    --//SE：ジャンプ音
PLAY_SE("SEa007.wav")
WAIT(200)
    --//SE：身を翻す音
PLAY_SE("SEc022.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ Without pause, I jumped three times in total. ]])

    --//SE：ジャンプ音
PLAY_SE("SEa007.wav")
WAIT(200)
    --//SE：身を翻す音
PLAY_SE("SEc022.wav")
WAIT(500)

    --//SE：着地音
PLAY_SE("SEc032.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ I landed steadily and waved to the audience. ]])

    MSG([[ The venue fell utterly silent. Hermes-san’s voice broke the silence. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0076.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "A backflip~~~~~~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    --//注釈：￥はハート

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0077.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Erika-chan just did three backflips on stage with no support! Amazing, amazing! I want to be able to do that toooooo!" ]])

    MSG([[ I thanked Hermes-san and bowed elegantly to the audience below. I felt strong confidence in this appeal myself. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG020ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,0,-400)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    --//SE：歓声（中）
PLAY_SE("SEf002.wav")
--WAIT(300)

    --//CI：得票率 リラ40：エリカ60 045
LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI045a")
LAYER_POSITION(60,0,200)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Cheers broke out. I got a great response for my physical ability—that’s what made me popular. ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ My skirt ballooned like a balloon but barely didn’t flip up, avoiding an indecent sight. The jump appeal was a success. ]])


    STOP_SE("SEf002.wav",1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0392.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "Lira-san, today I won’t hold back any strength." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Just because I’m male, I won’t underuse my physical ability anymore. ]])

    MSG([[ This is a serious match. If Lira-san’s weapon is fashion, then my weapon is my physical ability. ]])

    MSG([[ It would be a disservice not to use the weapon I have that surpasses Lira-san’s. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0393.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "Today, with all my body and soul, I’ll show you that I can win!" ]])
